pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python Wrapper for the SecuritySpy API![Latest PyPI version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pysecspy) ![Supported Python](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/pysecspy)This module communicates with a [SecuritySpy Video Server](https://www.bensoftware.com/securityspy/) and can retrieve and set data for:* Cameras* Motion Sensors* Motion EventsIt will require the Webserver component activated on SecuritySpy, and a Username, Password, IP Address and Port number for the Webserver.See `devicelist.py` and `eventlist.py` for examples on how to use this wrapper. And before doing so, edit each file and insert your SecuritySpy IP Adress, Port Number, Username and Password in the designated variables.```pythonUSERNAME = "YOUR_USERNAME"PASSWORD = "YOUR_PASSWORD"IPADDRESS = "YOUR_IP_ADDRESS"PORT = 8000```Change all the items in CAPITAL letters to your personal settings.
